title.rendered: Turme Latte 100 GMS Antioxidant and Anti-inflammatory benefits, Turmeric for general wellness

content.rendered:
• Turme Latte Tablets are a unique blend of Ayurvedic spices, designed to support respiratory health and overall immune function. This flavorful and aromatic blend offers a natural and comforting way to combat common cold and cough symptoms while boosting overall well-being. The active ingredient, turmeric (curcumin), is known for its numerous health benefits.

Key Benefits:

  • Antioxidant Properties: Turmeric, particularly its active compound curcumin, is known for its strong antioxidant properties, helping to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from oxidative stress, promoting overall health and well-being.
  • Skin Care Support: The natural properties of turmeric and other spices may help promote a healthy, radiant complexion.
    Immune-Boosting: May support the immune system, helping the body fight off common illnesses, especially during seasonal changes.
  • Respiratory Support: Specifically formulated to alleviate cough and cold symptoms, offering relief and comfort during respiratory challenges.
  • Anti-inflammatory: The blend of turmeric, cinnamon, ginger, and black pepper helps reduce inflammation and supports overall wellness.

Direction of use: Add one tablet of Turme Latte tablet to hot milk, stir well. Add honey or any sweetener of your choice if desired. Enjoy a hot drink.

Ingredients: Turmeric, cinnamon, ginger, and black pepper

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. This product is Dietary Supplement and not medicine.
